nodes.text: This transport was used by the Trade Federation during the Stark Hyperspace War.
It was similar to the C-9979 landing craft, but this craft's engines were arranged differently. It also appeared to have a short landing foot.
Transports of this kind were among the Federation ships attacked by the forces of the Stark Commercial Combine.
This may be the Trade Federation ore barge, said to be the inspiration of the C-9979 landing craft.
